Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
No need to translate. This inserts the PROMETHEAN_TECHGROUPS@PROMETHEAN@DESC and PROMETHEAN_TECHGROUPS@PROMETHEAN@FEATURES texts with some white space.
The [hyperlink,000003AC0000032F]Prometheans[/hyperlink] are planetary exterminators, eradicating threats with their PyrX fires.
[hyperlink,000003AC0000032F]圣火使者[/hyperlink]是星球的终结者，他们使用派尔克斯火焰消除各种威胁。

[bulletlist][bullet]Create weapons of mass destruction[/bullet][bullet]Employ powerful incendiary weapons[/bullet][bullet]Settle in inhospitable places[/bullet][bullet]Shield units and colonists from Armageddon[/bullet][bullet]Uses the Thermal and Kinetic damage channels[/bullet][/bulletlist]
[bulletlist][bullet]制造大规模杀伤性武器[/bullet][bullet]使用强大的燃烧武器[/bullet][bullet]可在不适宜居住的地方定居[/bullet][bullet]来自末日决战的护盾单位和移住民[/bullet][bullet]使用热能和动能伤害类型[/bullet][/bulletlist]

“When traveling through Promethean lands, stay close to agents who can deploy tactical protective technologies. I’ve watched the world around me devoured in an inferno, as I passed through unharmed.”[br/]– Mah Reg’Nib, Fleeing through Promethean Fire
“当穿越圣火之地时，不要离那些能够使用战术防护技术的特工太远。我曾经见证过周围的世界全部被烈火吞噬，但我却安然无恙地通过了那片火海。”[br/]– 玛·瑞格尼布在逃离圣火之时

“Ever seen a metal fire? Given enough heat and the right fuel, anything will burn. Such intense fire requires careful setup. Plasmoids are special delivery bots filled with concentrated fire. They are quite useful for sparking a powerful blaze.”[br/]– Haute Ashman, Scarlet Flame Rank
“可否见过金属的火焰？给予足量的热度和适当的燃料，任何事物都会燃烧。这种剧烈的火焰需要严格把关。等离子粒团是充满密集火焰的特殊运输机器，对制造熊熊烈焰非常有用。”[br/]– 浩特·阿什曼，深红烈焰小队

V.O.: Vanguard Male
Edit: removed extra space before "special"

“The pure should not feel threatened or afraid of the Promethean Division. It is well-trained, and follows strict protocols without error. This should be a great comfort to all who do not harbor corruption within. They should fear the flame.”[br/]– Khansu, the Burning Emperor
“纯净之人无需因圣火部门而感到威胁或害怕。他们训练有素并遵循着严格的协议，绝不会出现任何差错。内心没有堕落之人应当感到慰藉。他们害怕的应该是火焰。”[br/]– 坎苏，燃烧的帝王

“It is the solemn duty of every Purifier to cleanse the world with fire. The refiner melts silver with intense heat. Liquid ore separates from the dross impurities. We embrace our duty to refine society with fire and scorch the taint of plague.”[br/]– Logan Dwerg on Joining the Prometheans
“每一位净化者的庄严职责就是用火焰净化世界。我们就如同精炼的器械，用高温熔化银器，并把液态矿石从杂质糟粕中分离出来。我们专注于我们的职责，用烈焰净化这个社会，烧尽灾祸的腐蚀。”[br/]– 罗根·德维尔格在加入圣火者之时

“Only Promethean devotees are qualified to protect innocent lives from toxic hazards and fiery chemical reactions. Metal fires differ from chemical fires. We understand which disasters should be incinerated, extinguished or allowed to just burn out.”[br/]– Fire Chief Skollis Ernist
“只有圣火信徒才有资格保护无辜的生命免受剧毒灾害和剧烈化学反应的侵害。金属火焰和化学火焰不同，我们知道哪些灾祸应该被焚烧、消灭或是直接烧毁。”[br/]– 火焰长官斯克里斯·厄尔尼斯特

“Let me assure all concerned. We deploy only controlled burns. Our weapons only hit intended targets. Rest assured, if we burned it down, it was to destroy a threat to us all.”[br/]– Fire Marshal Billis Tonkata
“让我来为大家解惑。我们只会使用受到控制的火焰，我们的武器也只会攻击预定的目标。放心，如果我们把某个东西给彻底烧毁了，那其实是在为大家消除威胁。”[br/]– 火焰元帅比利斯·东卡塔

“When discovered, the PyrX agent was too volatile. It’s the ultimate reactant capable of oxidizing even the strongest molecular compounds to create glorious fire. With these latest innovations, we’re finally ready to weaponize PyrX.”[br/]– Shela Kilgraves, CEO Alchemicorp
“派尔克斯气体在最初被发现时十分不稳定。这是一种终极反应物，能够将最强大的分子化合物氧化并产生出耀眼的火焰。通过最近的革新，我们终于准备好将派尔克斯气体用于武器之上了。”[br/]– 炼金集团首席执行官薛拉·基尔格雷夫

“My duty is to the innocent and pure. We stand between the candle and the flame. I serve the helpless. While others flee the fire, I will run through it. No matter the danger, no matter the peril, I will hold the line.”[br/]– Promethean Aegis Corp Credo
“我的职责是保护无辜和纯净之人。我们立于蜡烛与火焰之间，为无助之人服务。当其他人从火焰中逃离时，我会在烈焰中穿行。无论会面对何种危险，我都将守住我的阵线。”[br/]– 圣火神盾军团教义

“Occasionally, an organization attempts to steal Promethean technology, ignoring our supervision, special PyrX absorption materials and safety protocols. They have limited success, inevitably doing as much damage to themselves as their enemies. There’s a reason we’ve been around for centuries.”[br/]– Haute Ashman, Scarlet Flame Rank
“有时，某些不在我们监督之下并无视特殊的派尔克斯吸收材料和安全协议的组织想要窃取圣火科技，结果往往都没有成功，还不可避免地使他们自己和敌人损失惨重。我们能在这个世界中存在这么久是有原因的。”[br/]–浩特·阿什曼，深红烈焰小队

“The Xenoplague must be incinerated completely. We will boil the seas and cremate all living things potentially exposed to this scourge to prevent its spread across the galaxy.”[br/]– Khansu, the Burning Emperor
“异星疫病必须被彻底焚毁。我们将让海水沸腾，烧死所有可能受到这一灾难影响的生物，防止它在星系中蔓延。”[br/]– 坎苏，燃烧的帝王

“Just go where we tell you, when we tell you, and how we tell you. Obey. If you get burned, that’s an indicator that you’re not following our protection procedures properly or you’re on the list for extermination.”[br/]– Madame Flora Radner, Phoenix Procedural Administrator
“时间、地点、方法，全部按照我们告诉你的来行事。服从我们的安排。如果你被烧伤，那说明你要么没有妥善遵循我们的保护程序，要么就是你也在消除名单之上。”[br/]– 芙洛拉·拉德纳尔女士，凤凰程序主管

“The Phoenix looms high, dousing the land in its feathers of crimson fire. Rising from my path of ashes, I pass through the inferno. The glow of my wings send spiraling eddies in my wake. I am more alive than ever.”[br/]– Ginette Greyson, Elite Trooper, Phoenix Battle Corp
“凤凰在高处赫然耸现，深红色的烈焰羽毛洒向地面。我从灰烬之路中复生，穿越那片火海。我的羽翼发出的光芒在身后留下转动的漩涡。我感受到了前所未有的生命力。”[br/]– 吉雷特·格雷森，精英骑兵，凤凰战斗军团

“Planets are born in flame and chaos. To succeed, life must employ fire, but reject chaos. Flame warms the hearth. Its sparks power pistons. As the world expires, we’ll set the fire free, only this time in an orderly fashion, one that we control.”[br/]– Khansu, the Burning Emperor
“星球诞生于火焰和混乱之中。要想获得成功，生命必须使用火焰而杜绝混乱。火焰能够温暖炉床，它的火花能为活塞供能。当世界末日来临时，我们将释放火焰，只不过这一次我们将采用井然有序且受我们控制的方式。”[br/]– 坎苏，燃烧的帝王

“The first sign of intelligence—the tool that distinguished humanity from other animals—came in man’s mastery of fire. We turned a destructive force into a tool. These latest inventions prove we’ve reached a whole new level of ingenuity.”[br/]– Dr. Simon Fiddler, Plasmatech Laboratories
“人类对火焰的掌握是智慧出现的初次迹象，正是这种智慧使人类与其他动物区分开来。我们将这种毁灭性的力量变成了一种工具，而这些最新的发明则证明我们的创新已经达到了全新的高度。”[br/]– 西蒙·费德勒博士，等离子技术实验室
